description:
About-

According to experts, almost ninety percent of teenagers worldwide use some kind of social media and more than 70% have their profile on some social networking site. There are many good things about social media, but there are also many possible dangers that the children should avoid. So it becomes important for young children to have the right social media skills.

Benefits of course-

'Social Media' course will enable students use the everyday common sense to take appropriate decisions. This course will enable the user to develop a better understanding of Social Media.

How it is taught-

Highly engaging animated instructor ( perhaps the 1st course on Udemy to have an animated instructor )

Interactive quiz to assess your social media quotient.
title: Social Media
